entry.title: Browser Extensions enhance Learning
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

今天带来几款插件帮助你更好的学习，不管你有没有学习的需求，都将提升你的效率。

  1. Enhance for YouTubeTM

    • Edge
    • Chrome
    • Firefox
    YouTube专用插件，可以设置暗色模式；视频分辨率以次可以不用每个视频都要选择分辨率，包括页面、小窗模式；关闭侧边相关视频，具体功能请自行安装测试。

  2. AI Subtitles & Immersive Translate - Trancy

    • Edge
    • Chrome
    • Firefox
    支持Youtube、TED、四大慕课平台和部分影视平台，比如Netflix和Disney+等，支持翻译成各种语言，提供双语字幕，翻译字幕，原始字幕（无字幕则语音识别）。

  3. SingleFile

    • Edge
    • Chrome
    • Firefox
    我们在学习和工作中有很多浏览场景，但遇到自己喜欢的网站，右键保存则会出现一个文件夹，里面一堆文件且保持浏览完整性不行删除，此插件解决了该问题，只生成html文件，十分简洁。

entry.title: A plugin help you academic
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

Jego 是一款 Edge 和Chrome 的插件，安装此插件允许免费用户访问谷歌服务、微软Copilot和ChatGPT等服务。请注意仅有谷歌搜索和谷歌学习，例如Youtube等娱乐工具是无法访问的，官网 也说了免费用户提供学术服务，付费用户可以解锁Youtube等娱乐网站，满足了很大一批用户的需求，对于国内的ip封锁，严重影响了科研人员检索文献的需求，因此 这款免费的插件真的十分良心，有喜欢的赶紧去体验一下吧。其插件需要注册才能使用，但是不要害怕，因为不需要邮箱📧验证，因此随便编一个邮箱即可，付费用户 除外。

entry.title: 学习谷歌搜索检索规则助力精准检索
entry.content:
阅读完这篇文章后，你应该浏览一下指导，了解我们博客的主要方面。

语法 语法说明 示例 示例解释
1 + 也可以用AND，搜索包含多个关键词的结果 生物信息学 + R语言
生物信息学 AND R语言		 搜索包含【生物信息学】和【R语言】两个词的页面
2 OR 或者 生物信息学 OR R语言 搜索包含【生物信息学】或【R语言】两个词的页面
3 - 不包含减号后面词的页面 生物信息学 -进化树 搜索不包括【进化树】的【生物信息学】的页面
4 “” 双引号，精确匹配 “生物信息学” 精确匹配【生物信息学】这个关键词的页面
5 * 星号，通配符，模糊搜索，星号代替某个字 **搜索 星号可以为任何字
6 @ 在用于搜索社交媒体的字词前加上@ Taylor Swift @Instagram 搜索ins上的霉霉
7 $ 在数字前加上$搜索特定价格 ChatGPT $20 搜索20$的ChatGPT会员
8 # 搜索 # 标签 #taylorswift 搜索标签霉霉
9 .. 两个点，在两个数字之间加上.. 在数字范围内执行搜索 Pixel 9 pro 1000..1500 搜索1000-1500的谷歌手机
10 filetype 指定某一种文件类型的资源 R语言实战 filetype:pdf 搜索类型为pdf的R语言实战网页
11 site 在指定站点搜索 生物信息学 site:https://www.zhihu.com 在知乎中搜索包含生物信息学的网页
12 cache 查看网站的 Google 缓存版本，会直接显示缓存页面 cache:weibo.com 查看微博的谷歌快照
13 info 在网址前加info:，获取网站详情 info:github.com 搜索github网站详情
14 related 搜索与某个网站有关联的页面 related:sina.com 和新浪网网站结构内容相似的一些其它网站
15 link 返回所有链接到某个URL地址的网页 link:www.csdn.net 搜索所有含指向【www.csdn.net】链接的网页
16 inurl 搜索查询词出现在url 中的页面 inurl:生物信息学 搜索链接url中有【生物信息学】的网页
17 intitle 搜索查询词出现在页面标题(title)中的页面，支持中文和英文 intitle:生物信息学 搜索页面标题中有【生物信息学】的网页
18 intext 搜索查询词出现在页面正文(title)中的页面，支持中文和英文 SEO intext:GO富集分析 在正文包含【GO富集分析】的网页中搜索【SEO】
19 inanchor 搜索链接锚文字(即链接显示的文字)中包含搜索词的页面 inanchor:前端 搜索链接锚文字中包含【前端】的页面
20 allinurl 即all+inurl 页面url中包含多个关键词的页面 allinurl:SEO 搜索引擎优化 相当于 ：inurl:SEO inurl:搜索引擎优化
21 allintitle 即all+intitle 页面标题中包含多个关键词的页面 allintitle:SEO 搜索引擎优化 相当于：intitle:SEO intitle:搜索引擎优化
22 allintext 即all+inanchor 页面正文包含多个关键词的页面 allintext:SEO 搜索引擎优化 相当于：intext:SEO intext:搜索引擎优化
23 allinanchor 即all+inanchor 页面链接锚文字包含多个关键词的页面 allinanchor:SEO 搜索引擎优化 相当于：inanchor:SEO inanchor:搜索引擎优化
24 weather weather/time/sunrise/sundown+城市名，返回城市的天气/时间/日出时间/日落时间 weather:beijing 显示北京的天气
25 music 也可以用songs，歌手名字+music/songs Taylor Swift music
Taylor Swift songs		 返回霉霉的各首歌曲 
上述表格的符号全为英文状态下的符号，空格一定要有。

虽然有那么多语法，但是我们不需要全部记忆，只需要在我们需要的时候看一下在进行检索，用多了就记住了，而且不是都很常用，一般常用的是1，3，4，10， 11，16-18。语法不是单一的，是可以一起使用的。比如：

"生物信息学" site: www.blog.csdn.net

就是搜索CSDN中包括生物信息学的文章。因为CSDN提供搜索服务，所以这只是一个举例，有些网站并不提供检索服务，才是适用场景。请注意，语法是工具， 不是你记忆的累赘，如果没有多少使用场景可以不使用，而是依靠现有的Large Language Model(LLM)，即现有的生成式AI模型，可以提升我们的效率。

entry.title: Online Learning Web
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

国内（中国大陆）学习资源正在被封杀，百度网盘/阿里云盘/夸克网盘一直在和谐大量学习资源，所以我们决定将自己手中的资源迁移到个人 博客平台，也是为了保护部分资源。由于我们国人有着白嫖的思想，与外国人思想有所差异，付费观看的人数屈指可数，加上部分人的预算有限， 所以我们整理了国外慕课平台和其他学习站点，为什么没有整理国内慕课平台，请自行寻找观看后，理由便知。

首先,最大的两个资源网站是 Google搜索 和 Youtube ，其中对于油管中某些言论/不当言论经过几次检索就会自动被推送机制排除，请注意你的目的是为了学习，不要受到外部因素的影响。
接下来是五大慕课平台，认真寻找，虽然是收费的，但是有旁听选项，可以获取课件和观看视频。

  1. Coursera
  2. edX
  3. Udemy
  4. Khan Academy
  5. Brilliant

entry.title: Lehninger’s principles of biochemistry,7e
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

📚 Introducing: Lehninger’s Principles of Biochemistry, 7th Edition! 🧬

Hey there, college students! 📣 If you're diving into the world of biochemistry, there's one book that you absolutely cannot miss: Lehninger’s Principles of Biochemistry, 7th Edition. This book isn't just a textbook; it's a treasure trove of knowledge that will guide you through the fascinating world of biochemical processes. 🌟

Why Lehninger's Principles? 🤔

  1. Comprehensive Content: This edition is packed with detailed, up-to-date information that covers all the core topics in biochemistry. From the basic concepts to the most advanced topics, it’s all in there. It’s like having a personal biochemistry tutor right on your bookshelf! 🧪📖
  2. Clear Explanations: The authors, David L. Nelson and Michael M. Cox, are experts in making complex topics understandable. They use clear language, helpful diagrams, and engaging examples to ensure you grasp every concept. 🧠✨
  3. Engaging Learning Tools: With this book, learning is never boring. It includes various tools like end-of-chapter questions, problem-solving tips, and real-life applications that make studying interactive and fun. 📝🔬

What’s New in the 7th Edition? 🚀

Updated Research: Stay ahead with the latest research and discoveries in the field. The 7th edition includes updated content reflecting recent advances in biochemistry. 🔍🔬

New Illustrations and Graphics: Visual learners, rejoice! The new edition comes with enhanced illustrations and graphics that make understanding the material even easier. 🎨📊

Enhanced Learning Features: More interactive and engaging features have been added to help you connect with the material on a deeper level. 📚💡

Who Should Read This Book? 👨‍🎓👩‍🎓

Whether you’re a biochemistry major or just taking an introductory course, this book is a perfect companion. It’s designed to cater to both beginners and advanced learners, ensuring everyone can benefit from its wealth of knowledge. 🌐📘

Final Thoughts 💭

Lehninger’s Principles of Biochemistry(7th Edition), is more than just a textbook; it’s your guide to mastering biochemistry. With its clear explanations, comprehensive coverage, and engaging tools, it's the ideal resource for any college student looking to excel in this subject. So, what are you waiting for? Dive into the wonders of biochemistry today! 🧬🚀📚

You can get PDF via Link

entry.title: Data Mining 3rd
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

Dive into Data Mining with "Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, 3rd Edition" 📚💡

Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey into the world of data mining and machine learning? Look no further than "DATA MINING: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, 3rd Edition" by Ian H. Witten, Eibe Frank, and Mark A. Hall. This book is your comprehensive guide to mastering the art of extracting valuable insights from data using cutting-edge machine learning techniques. 🌟

A Treasure Trove for Data Enthusiasts

Whether you're a data scientist, an aspiring machine learning expert, or simply someone with a keen interest in data, this book is packed with everything you need to know. It starts with the basics and progresses to more advanced topics, ensuring that readers of all skill levels can benefit. The authors do an exceptional job of explaining complex concepts in a clear and engaging manner, making learning both fun and effective. 🤓

Practical Insights and Hands-On Approach

What sets this book apart is its emphasis on practical application. The third edition is filled with real-world examples and case studies that demonstrate how to apply machine learning techniques to solve actual problems. You'll learn how to preprocess data, select appropriate algorithms, and evaluate the performance of your models. This hands-on approach ensures that you're not just learning theory, but also gaining the skills needed to implement machine learning in your own projects. 🛠️🔍

Comprehensive Coverage of Tools and Techniques

From decision trees and neural networks to support vector machines and ensemble methods, this book covers a wide range of machine learning algorithms. The authors also delve into important topics like feature selection, model evaluation, and improving model accuracy. Each chapter is accompanied by detailed explanations and code examples, primarily using the WEKA software—a powerful and widely-used tool in the data mining community. 🧠💻

Staying Relevant in a Fast-Changing Field

The field of machine learning is constantly evolving, and this edition has been updated to reflect the latest advancements. You'll find new sections on deep learning, big data, and the integration of machine learning with other technologies. Staying up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques is crucial, and this book ensures you're always at the cutting edge. 🚀📈

Conclusion

"DATA MINING: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, 3rd Edition" is an invaluable resource for anyone looking to delve deep into the world of data mining and machine learning. With its clear explanations, practical approach, and comprehensive coverage, this book is perfect for both beginners and seasoned professionals. So, why wait? Grab your copy today and start unlocking the potential hidden in your data! 🌐📊

You can get PDF via Link

entry.title: Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology Concepts and Experiments 9e By Gerald Karp, Janet Iwasa, Wallace Marshall
entry.content:

📚 Introducing: Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology, Concepts and Experiments, 9th Edition! 🧬

Hey, bioscience and medical students! 📣 If you're ready to dive into the captivating world of cell and molecular biology, then you absolutely need to check out Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology, Concepts and Experiments, 9th Edition by Gerald Karp, Janet Iwasa, and Wallace Marshall. This book is a treasure trove of knowledge, packed with everything you need to excel in your studies. 🌟

Why Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology? 🤔

  1. Comprehensive Content: This book offers an exhaustive overview of cell and molecular biology. From the basic building blocks of life to complex cellular processes, it covers everything you need to know. It's perfect for both beginners and advanced students. 🧬📖
  2. Clear and Engaging Explanations: The authors have a knack for making complex concepts easy to understand. They use clear language, detailed diagrams, and practical examples to ensure you can grasp even the most challenging topics. 🧠✨
  3. Experimental Approach: What sets this book apart is its emphasis on experiments. It doesn't just teach you the theory but also explains the experiments that led to these discoveries, helping you appreciate the scientific process. 🧪🔬

What’s New in the 9th Edition? 🚀

Updated Research: The 9th edition includes the latest research and advancements in the field, keeping you up to date with the most recent discoveries and trends in cell and molecular biology. 🔍🔬

Enhanced Visuals: With improved illustrations and graphics, this edition makes it easier for visual learners to understand and retain complex information. 🎨📊

Interactive Learning Tools: This edition comes with a range of interactive features that make studying more engaging and effective. 📚💡

Who Should Read This Book? 👨‍🎓👩‍🎓

Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology is perfect for bioscience students, medical students, and anyone with a keen interest in the intricacies of cellular mechanisms. Whether you're preparing for exams, conducting research, or simply expanding your knowledge, this book is an essential resource. 🌐📘

Final Thoughts 💭

Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology, Concepts and Experiments, 9th Edition, is more than just a textbook—it's your guide to mastering the complexities of cell and molecular biology. With its comprehensive content, clear explanations, and engaging experimental approach, it’s an invaluable tool for any bioscientific or medical student. So, what are you waiting for? Embark on your journey into the fascinating world of cell biology with Karp’s Cell and Molecular Biology! 🧬🚀📚

entry.title: Machine Learning in action
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

Dive into the World of Machine Learning with "Machine Learning in Action" 📘🤖

Are you ready to unlock the incredible potential of machine learning and take your data analysis skills to the next level? Look no further than "Machine Learning in Action" by Peter Harrington. This book is a comprehensive guide that provides you with the knowledge and tools needed to master machine learning concepts and apply them in real-world scenarios. 🌟

A Perfect Blend of Theory and Practice

"Machine Learning in Action" strikes the perfect balance between theoretical foundations and practical applications. The book is structured to cater to both beginners and experienced professionals, ensuring that readers can follow along regardless of their prior experience. Harrington's clear and engaging writing style makes complex concepts accessible, allowing you to grasp the essentials of machine learning without feeling overwhelmed. 📚✨

Hands-On Approach to Learning

One of the standout features of this book is its hands-on approach. Each chapter is filled with practical examples and exercises that allow you to apply what you've learned immediately. By working through these exercises, you'll gain valuable experience in implementing machine learning algorithms and solving real-world problems. The book covers a wide range of topics, from simple linear regression to more advanced techniques like support vector machines and clustering. 🛠️🔍

Comprehensive Coverage of Algorithms

"Machine Learning in Action" provides an in-depth exploration of various machine learning algorithms and techniques. You'll learn about decision trees, neural networks, ensemble methods, and more. Each algorithm is explained in detail, with clear, step-by-step instructions on how to implement them using Python. The book also covers important topics like feature selection, model evaluation, and improving model accuracy, ensuring that you have a solid understanding of the entire machine learning pipeline. 🧠💻

Real-World Applications

What sets this book apart is its focus on real-world applications. Harrington provides numerous examples and case studies that demonstrate how machine learning can be used to solve actual problems. From predicting stock prices to detecting spam emails, these examples show you how to apply machine learning techniques in practical situations. This approach not only reinforces your understanding but also gives you the confidence to tackle your own data challenges. 🌐📊

Staying Ahead in a Dynamic Field

The field of machine learning is constantly evolving, and "Machine Learning in Action" ensures that you stay ahead of the curve. The book includes the latest advancements in machine learning research and practical applications, making it a must-read for anyone looking to stay relevant in this dynamic field. By keeping up with the latest trends and techniques, you'll be prepared to tackle the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead. 🚀📈

Conclusion

"Machine Learning in Action" by Peter Harrington is an invaluable resource for anyone interested in mastering machine learning. With its clear explanations, practical approach, and comprehensive coverage, this book is perfect for both beginners and experienced professionals. So, why wait? Dive into the world of machine learning and unlock the full potential of your data today! 🌟📘

You can get PDF via Link

entry.title: R in action 2nd
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

Unlocking the Power of Data with "R in Action, 2nd Edition"

In the ever-evolving landscape of data science and statistics, mastering powerful tools to analyze, interpret, and visualize data has become indispensable. If you’re a data enthusiast, statistician, or a budding data scientist looking to harness the full potential of R, you must dive into "R in Action, 2nd Edition" by Robert I. Kabacoff. This book is more than just a guide; it’s a comprehensive resource designed to elevate your data manipulation and analysis skills.

Comprehensive Guide for All Skill Levels

What sets "R in Action, 2nd Edition" apart from other R programming books is its accessibility to both beginners and advanced users. The book starts with the basics, guiding you through the installation of R and RStudio, and it gradually builds up to more complex topics. Kabacoff’s engaging writing style ensures that even those with minimal programming experience can follow along and understand the concepts.

For beginners, the initial chapters cover the fundamentals of R programming, including basic syntax, data structures, and essential functions. These chapters are filled with practical examples and exercises that reinforce learning and provide hands-on experience. By the time you finish the introductory sections, you’ll have a solid foundation in R and be ready to tackle more advanced topics.

Deep Dive into Data Analysis

One of the core strengths of "R in Action" is its extensive coverage of data analysis techniques. The book delves into various statistical methods and how to implement them using R. Whether you're dealing with descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, or regression analysis, Kabacoff provides clear explanations and practical examples that make these concepts easier to grasp.

The book also explores advanced statistical methods such as analysis of variance (ANOVA), principal component analysis (PCA), and time series analysis. Each method is accompanied by R code and detailed explanations, allowing you to see exactly how the analysis is performed and interpret the results effectively.

Data Visualization and Graphics

A significant portion of the book is dedicated to data visualization, an essential aspect of data analysis. Kabacoff introduces you to R's powerful graphics capabilities through base graphics and the ggplot2 package. You'll learn how to create a wide variety of plots, including bar charts, histograms, scatterplots, and more complex visualizations like heatmaps and interactive plots.

Kabacoff emphasizes the importance of visualizing data to uncover hidden patterns and communicate findings effectively. The book includes numerous examples and code snippets, showing you how to customize your plots and make them publication-ready.

Practical Applications and Case Studies

To bridge the gap between theory and practice, "R in Action" includes numerous real-world examples and case studies. These examples cover a broad range of topics, from analyzing survey data and time series forecasting to machine learning and data mining. Kabacoff demonstrates how to apply R to solve practical problems, giving you the tools and knowledge to tackle your own data projects.

Each case study is presented in a step-by-step manner, with detailed explanations and R code provided. This approach allows you to see the entire process of data analysis, from data cleaning and preparation to modeling and interpretation of results.

Stay Up-to-Date with the Latest Features

The second edition of "R in Action" has been updated to reflect the latest developments in the R ecosystem. Kabacoff includes new features and packages that have emerged since the first edition, ensuring that you’re equipped with the most current tools and techniques. This includes coverage of the dplyr and tidyr packages for data manipulation, the purrr package for functional programming, and the caret package for machine learning.

Conclusion

"R in Action, 2nd Edition" is an invaluable resource for anyone looking to master R and elevate their data analysis skills. Robert I. Kabacoff’s clear explanations, practical examples, and extensive coverage of statistical methods, data visualization, and real-world applications make this book a must-have for both beginners and advanced users.

Whether you're a student, a professional statistician, or a data science enthusiast, "R in Action" will empower you to tackle complex data challenges and uncover valuable insights. With this book by your side, you'll be well-equipped to navigate the ever-evolving field of data science and make data-driven decisions with confidence.

I hope you find this introduction to "R in Action, 2nd Edition" insightful! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. 📘📊

You can get PDF via Link

Olson, a renowned AI and machine learning researcher from the University of Pennsylvania. A Comprehensive Guide for All Levels

By the end of the book, you'll have a solid foundation in machine learning and be well-equipped to tackle complex data problems. 🛠️🔍

"Python Machine Learning" delves into a wide range of machine learning algorithms and techniques, from basic linear regression to sophisticated neural networks. entry.title: 托马斯微积分 第十版
entry.content:
阅读完这篇文章后，你应该浏览一下指导，了解我们博客的主要方面。

📚 介绍：《托马斯微积分 第十版》 🌟

大家好！📣 今天我想向大家介绍一本非常重要的书籍——《托马斯微积分 第十版》。这本书不仅是学习微积分的经典教材，而且是深入理解数学概念的理想工具。 无论你是刚开始学习微积分的学生，还是已经有一定基础的学者，这本书都能为你提供宝贵的知识和帮助。 🧠✨

为什么选择《托马斯微积分》？🤔

  1. 全面而深入的内容：本书涵盖了微积分的基本概念和高级应用，内容详尽、结构清晰。从极限、导数到积分和微分方程，所有重要内容都囊括在内。 📖🔍
  2. 清晰易懂的解释：作者乔治·B.托马斯和玛利·戴维斯以其简明扼要的解释闻名。通过生动的例子和图表，他们使复杂的数学概念变得容易理解。 🧩📊
  3. 丰富的练习题：本书提供了大量的习题，帮助学生巩固所学知识并应用于实际问题。每章结尾的习题都经过精心设计，确保能有效提升你的问题解决能力。 📝🔢

第十版的亮点 🚀

  • 更新的内容：第十版添加了许多最新的研究成果和应用实例，使读者能够紧跟学术前沿。 📈🔬
  • 改进的图表和插图：本版加强了图形和插图的展示，特别适合视觉学习者。图表不仅美观，而且有助于理解复杂的数学概念。 🎨📉
  • 互动学习工具：本书还配有多种互动学习工具，包括在线资源和视频教程，帮助你更好地理解和掌握微积分的精髓。 📚💡

读者群体 🌍

《托马斯微积分 第十版》适合所有对微积分感兴趣的学生。无论你是处于学术研究阶段，还是正在学习微积分的基本概念，这本书都能成为你不可或缺的良师益友。 📘🌟

结语 💭

《托马斯微积分 第十版》不仅是一本教材，更是你通向数学世界的一扇大门。通过这本书，你不仅能掌握微积分的核心知识，还能培养解决实际问题的能力。无论 是为了考试准备，还是为了扩展知识，这本书都是你的理想选择。 🧮🚀📚

祝大家学习愉快！📖😊

You can get PDF via Link

entry.title: Install Google Play Store On Phone
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

最新的国产Android系统内置Google服务，请注意，华为安卓鸿蒙系统(version ≤ HarmonyOS4.2)没有，但是可以使用其他开源项目来调用GMS，稍后会讲。在设置中有Google开关选项，唯有Google Play Store需要手动安装，安装包可以通过以下链接下载（无需魔法访问）：
TechSpot
APKSHKI
FilePlanet
Softpedia
当然，除了下载Play Store安装App，也有一些不依赖Google服务的应用商店，可以无需Google账号即可下载App，这些平台非华为Harmony Next系统手机也可安装使用：
Aurora Store
uptodown
Amazon App Store
除此之外，还有一些网站（需要魔法）也可以之间下载apk文件（安卓APP安装包）：
APKmirror
APKCombo
Uptodown
华为安卓鸿蒙系统(version ≤ HarmonyOS4.2)可以安装MicroG来替代GMS，不过华为手机无法安装Play Store或者说有办法安装，但是不能更新系统，一更新就不能用了，就得重新安装，并且安装非常麻烦，所以推荐大家使用MicroG+第三方App Store。MicroG作为开源程序，安全性可以得到保障，据说华为欧洲也在积极适配。
MicroG所需要的安装包项目主页 均已提供，另外华为应用市场非国区也可下载：华为应用商店→我的→设置→国家/地区→选择的其他国家→输入账号密码验证→下载MicroG Companion和MicroG Server→打开手机设置-应用和服务-应用管理→打开MicroG服务APP详情页面→点击右上角齿轮→点击自我检查→添加Google账号，完成后即可使用。

entry.title: Reconmmended Node Shop
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

机场众多，勿买廉价节点

可选择的机场很多，但也不乏有几元/月的节点，这些机场存在安全风险，请慎重考虑。价格高的机场拥有更好的速度与服务，如果不愿意在此方面花销太多，可以选择免费的节点，它们多源于博主的分享，在此不予分享，请自行检索。接下来为大家推荐几个经典老牌机场，他们经营多年，跑路风险相对较低。

收费机场推荐

  1. 桔子云
  2. NiceCloud
  3. 跨境Cloud
  4. 极客云
  5. DuangCloud
  6. Gatern
  7. 流量光 ### 此机场似乎有问题，慎重选择

再次提醒，机场用于学习用途最佳，娱乐要求不高的没必要付费，保持高度理智，不要被某些言论误导，要有自己的意志。爱国，爱家人，爱自己。

OpenWrt/iStoreOS

  1. openClash https://github.com/vernesong/OpenClash/releases
  2. passwall https://github.com/xiaorouji/openwrt-passwall/releases

美区Apple ID

非常简单，首先注册你所在国家或地区的Apple账号，然后在账号信息中修改成美国地址即可，可以用美国地址生成器完成。

For Chinese

对于使用Android手机的用户，国产OS内置大量广告以及反诈骗APP，十分影响体验，因此可以刷入基于AOSP制作的类原生OS，没有广告且不臃肿，比较有名的
有 Pixel Experience , Lineage OS , Ares OS ,
CrDroid 等等。鉴于国家政策，多数厂商关闭了BL解锁通道，目前仅有OnePlus用户可以轻松解锁BootLoader进行刷机操作，其
他品牌均有各种问题，需要说明的是三星解锁Bl很简单，但是不能root，有熔断机制。因此如果你有搞机需求，国产手机仅有oneplus还可以，国外品牌就很轻松了，
Google Pixel，Samsung，Sony，Moto均没有限制，其中Google的ROM最多。

entry.title: Save and manage any website you loved
entry.content:
After reading this post, you should read Guidance.

Hey everyone! I’ve got something truly exciting to share. Imagine having a personal library where all your favorite articles, videos, and web content are stored, easily accessible whenever you need them. That’s exactly what the Pocket app offers!

Pocket is a fantastic tool that lets you save all sorts of content for later reading or viewing. Whether you come across an insightful article during a busy workday, or a thought-provoking video that you just don’t have the time to watch immediately, Pocket has your back. Simply save the content to Pocket, and it’ll be there waiting for you when you have a moment to spare.

One of the best features of Pocket is its seamless integration with your daily routine. You can save content directly from your browser, or even from your favorite apps using the share button. And if you’re someone who likes to consume content on the go, Pocket’s offline mode is a game-changer. No internet? No problem. Access your saved items anytime, anywhere.

Plus, Pocket makes it easy to keep your saved content organized with tags, so you can effortlessly find that article on deep-sea exploration you saved last month. And for those who enjoy a good listen, Pocket’s text-to-speech functionality turns articles into an audio experience.

So, if you’re looking to streamline your reading and viewing habits and never miss out on great content again, Pocket is the app for you. Download it today and start saving smarter! 📚✨

Pocket是一款Android/iOS软件，当然也有网页端 。移动端请从 Google Play Store / App Store 下载。浏览器插件提供更便捷的保存网站操作， Edge 和 Chrome 有 对应的插件。

entry.title: 利用follo订阅本博客
entry.content:
利用follo订阅该频道

阅读完这篇文章后，你应该浏览一下指导，了解我们博客的主要方面。

follow

🌟 发现RSSNext/Follow：革新您的新闻阅读方式！ 📲

您是否厌倦了在社交媒体上无休止地滚动来寻找真正对您有用的新闻？欢迎使用RSSNext/Follow ，这款应用将成为您内容消费世界的新朋友！🚀 这款软件可在GitHub上获取，它旨在改变您关注喜爱的博客、新闻网站以及任何带有RSS订阅源的内容的方式。让我为您详细介绍一下为什么RSSNext/Follow会是改变游戏规则的工具！📰✨

什么是RSSNext/Follow？

RSSNext/Follow是一款强大的开源RSS聚合工具。它允许您在一个地方收集、组织和阅读来自各种来源的内容。忘记那些无关的噪音，这款应用让您专注于真正感兴趣的内容。🎯

为什么选择RSSNext/Follow？

  • 用户友好的界面：再也不必忍受笨重、过时的设计了。RSSNext/Follow拥有简洁、直观的用户界面，方便导航。无论您是技术专家还是普通用户，都能轻松上手。🏠
  • 丰富的自定义选项：根据您的兴趣定制您的订阅源。关注特定的话题、关键字或来源，一切都由您掌控！🛠️
  • 实时更新：通过即时更新，掌握最新动态。当您的喜爱网站发布新内容时，它会立刻出现在您的订阅源中。⚡
  • 离线阅读：随时随地阅读。RSSNext/Follow允许您下载文章进行离线阅读，适合通勤、飞行或任何网络不稳定的地方。✈️
  • 开源且免费：最好的东西往往是免费的，RSSNext/Follow也不例外。加上作为开源软件，它不断得到充满热情的开发者社区的改进。💪

如何开始？

点击GitHub仓库 并下载你使用操作系统的安装包。安装过程简洁明了，还有丰富的文档帮助您快速上手。📚

利用follow订阅本博客

  1. 打开follo软件，输入链接https://alllink-official.github.io/atom.xml
  2. 关注，可以根据自己的需要给与备注
  3. 关注后，文章即可出现在APP主页
